dc_title_s: Riparian map of Hudson River featuring New York and New Jersey shorelines, with a handwritten note for the application of N.Y Dock Department for U.S. pierhead and bulkhead line
dc_description_s: Map showing the Hudson River, New York/New Jersey Line, featuring a handwritten note where the New York Dock Department was applying for a pierhead and bulkhead line, near Spuyten Duyvil Creek|Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection|No precise date given; inferred from the note where a hearing is scheduled for November 3, 1921|no scale found on map
